IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: PROVIDE GRANTS TO QUALIFIED CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS AS DETERMINED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO SUPPORT THE CHARITABLE INTERESTS OF THE BOLDT FAMILY FOUNDATION WHICH INCLUDE PROVIDING GRANTS TO CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS INTERESTED IN SCIENTIFIC, HEALTH, THE PERFORMING ARTS AND LITERARY AND/OR EDUCATIONAL PURPOSES.
IRS990.Desc: PROVIDED GRANTS THROUGH A COMPETITIVE PROCESS TO MORE THAN 85 PUBLIC CHARITIES SUPPORTING THE INTERESTS OF THE BOLDT FAMILY AND THE BOLDT COMPANY WITH PRIORITY GIVEN TO EDUCATION, HEALTHCARE, ENVIRONMENT, AND THE ARTS.

SupportedOrganizationName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: COMMUNITY FOUNDATION FOR THE FOX VALLEY REGION

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GRANT RECIPIENTS ARE EXPECTED TO ABIDE BY THE TERMS AND CONDITIONS SET FORTH IN THE GRANT APPLICATION AND GRANT AGREEMENT, INCLUDING SUBMISSION OF PROGRESS OR FINAL REPORTS AS DEEMED APPROPRIATE BY INDIVIDUAL GRANTMAKING COMMITTEES. ELIGIBILITY FOR FUTURE FUNDING IS CONTINGENT UPON CHARITABLE ORGANIZATIONS' MEETING THESE TERMS AND CONDITIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: OSCAR C. BOLDT AND THOMAS J. BOLDT HAVE A FAMILY RELATIONSHIP

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION A, LINE 7A
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS CONSIST OF TWO CLASSES: APPOINTED DIRECTORS AND ELECTED DIRECTORS. THE NUMBER OF APPOINTED DIRECTORS SHALL AT ALL TIMES BE AT LEAST ONE MORE THAN THE NUMBER OF ELECTED DIRECTORS. THE APPOINTED DIRECTORS ARE APPOINTED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS OF THE COMMUNITY FOUNDATION FOR THE FOX VALLEY REGION, INC. OR A DULY-AUTHORIZED COMMITTEE OF THE COMMUNITY FOUNDATION. THE COMMUNITY FOUNDATION IS THE SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION OF THE BOLDT FAMILY FUND, INC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION'S FORM 990 IS PREPARED BY THE CPA FIRM COMPLETING THE ANNUAL AUDIT OF THE COMMUNITY FOUNDATION FOR THE FOX VALLEY REGION, INC. THE VICE PRESIDENT - FINANCE AND ADMINISTRATION FOR THE COMMUNITY FOUNDATION FOR THE FOX VALLEY REGION, INC. REVIEWS IT FOR REASONABLENESS. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS WILL APPROVE THE FORM 990 FOR FILING AT A MEETING OR VIA EMAIL POLL BETWEEN OCTOBER AND FEBRUARY OF EACH FISCAL YEAR. THE BOARD VICE PRESIDENT OR ANOTHER OFFICER SIGNS THE FORM.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ON AN ANNUAL BASIS, THE DIRECTORS OF THE ORGANIZATION ARE REQUIRED TO COMPLETE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT DESCRIBING THEIR RELATIONSHIPS AND THEIR FAMILY RELATIONSHIPS WITH OTHER ENTITIES DOING BUSINESS WITH THE ORGANIZATION AND ALL RELATED ORGANIZATIONS. WHEN THE BOARD CONSIDERS A GRANT FOR APPROVAL, A DIRECTOR SHALL BE DEEMED TO HAVE ABSTAINED AS TO THAT PORTION OF THE GRANT REQUEST WHICH AFFECTS ANY ENTITY NOTED ON THAT DIRECTOR'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST STATEMENT

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REQUESTS FOR THE FOLLOWING DOCUMENTS CAN BE SENT TO: EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT COMMUNITY FOUNDATION FOR THE FOX VALLEY REGION, INC. 4455 W. LAWRENCE ST. APPLETON, WI 54914 -APPLICATION FOR RECOGNITION OF EXEMPTION UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3)(FORM 1023) -IRS DETERMINATION LETTER -ARTICLES AND BY-LAWS -CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY THE COMMUNITY FOUNDATION FOR THE FOX VALLEY REGION INC. (SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION) PUBLISHES ITS CONSOLIDATED AUDITED FINANCIAL STATEMENTS, ANNUAL REPORT AND COMPETITIVE GRANT GUIDELINES, WHICH INCLUDES THE BOLDT FAMILY FUND INC., ON ITS WEBSITE AT WWW.CFFOXVALLEY.ORG.
